item.title: Syncope Basics: Manage Microsoft Azure part II
item.description: How to configure Apache Syncope to support Licenses assignment / removal on Microsoft Azure AD.

item.title: Syncope Basics: Manage Microsoft Azure
item.description: How to configure Apache Syncope to provision Users and Groups to Microsoft Azure AD

item.title: SAML Single SignOn to Apache Syncope

item.title: Syncope Basics: Manage external DB
item.description: First post of a new series where simple boilerplate-like examples are shown, with Apache Syncope set up for provisioning to external resources
